articles.author: Zack Budryk
articles.title: Atlantic Ocean currents system could collapse this century from climate change: study - The Hill
articles.description: A major Atlantic current could collapse by the middle of the century as a result of climate change, prompting extreme cold in Europe and sea level rise along the eastern coast of the U.S., according to a study published Tuesday in the journal Nature Communica…
